name: Microwave Fudge
author: Clint Estes
instructions: Sift cocoa and sugar in a large mixing bowl. Add milk and lay margarine sticks on top. Do not stir. Cook on High for 6 minutes. Remove from microwave and stir thoroughly. Add vanilla flavoring and nuts. Stir until well mixed. Pour onto buttered platter. Cool in refrigerator for 1 hour. Cut and serve. Do not double this recipe.
